import React from "react"; import "../styles/form.scss"; const Form = () => { const [parameters, setParameters] = React.useState({}); const handleChange = (event) => { setParameters({ ...parameters, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; const show = (type) => { if (type === "buy") { parameters.buyIndicator2 === "Number" ? "number" : hidden; } else if (type === "sell") { if (parameters.sellIndicator2 === "Number") { return "number"; } else { return "hidden"; } } }; return (
